column4: I'm trying to upgrade to hoary from warty and having some X problems
lots of fun with Hoary + Xorg
is there some docs on this that I missed?
what problem are you having ?
X just doesn't start
startx brings up a session
you can try xorgconfig
I think it's a package problem
it will walk you through setting up xorg. If there is an XF86Config-4 file in the X11 directory it seems to want to use that file for some reason.
the live CD comes up fine and I "borrowed" the xorg.conf file
did you dis-upgrade ?
err dist-upgrade
by running apt-get update with a faild dist-upgrade did I screw the install?
that's probably what happened. Sometimes if it bombs out you just try again. try apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade
apt-get update shows no packages to be updated
same with dist-upgrade
you did apt-get dist-upgrade ?
yea
well you can try xorgconfig
k, I'll give it a shot
is there a way to re-run the base install
something like dpkg-reconfigrue base-config
I dunno if that will work, one way to find out :D
is base-config the right option?
